name: ai-email-cleaner-extension
description: AI-powered Gmail extension using Gemini AI for intelligent email cleanup

scripts.dev: echo 'Load extension from chrome://extensions in developer mode'
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../ai-email-cleaner.zip .
scripts.deploy-function: cd appwrite-functions/gemini-analyzer && npm install && appwrite deploy function
scripts.test: echo 'No automated tests yet. Manual testing required.'
